title: The AT&T display construction set user interface management system (UIMS)
proctitle: CHI '92: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

references.text: Green, M. Directions for User Interface Management Systems Research. Computer Graphics 21, 2 (April 1987), 113-116.
Hill, R. Some Important Features and Issues in User Interface Management Systems, Computer Graphics 21, 2 (April 1987), 116-120.
Rhyne, J., Ehrich, R., Bennett, J., Hewett, T, Sibert, J., and Bleser, T. Tools and Methodology for User Interface Development, Computer Graphics 21, 2(April 1987), 78- 87.
